value.title: DAX Fridays #16: DATEADD
value.excerpt: DATEADD is a really useful function to create sets of dates backwords or forward from a point in time. It is used for Previous date calculations. value.title: DAX Fridays! #163: Best practices when using error functions in DAX

value.title: DAX Fridays! #166: Compare spread after the first 100 cases | Recreating the Financial Times Graph
value.excerpt: In todays video I will show you how to recreate the financial times graph in power bi where they compare the spread of confirmed cases after the countries hit their first 100 cases.  We will do the calculation using DAX and will plot the graph in Power BI.  Link to FT article: https://www.ft.com/content/a26fbf7e-48f8-11ea-aeb3-955839e06441

value.title: DAX Fridays! #167: Calculate previous row using DAX
value.excerpt: You have been asking me, how do I calculate previous row in Power  BI using DAX so I can get new cases on the corona dataset? , and this is exactly what we are going to do in this video. value.title: DAX FRIDAYS! #178 : My age calculations in DAX and Power Query are wrong!! How do I do it?
value.excerpt: Calculating age is harder that you think, both in power query and dax.
